title: Have illegal border trafficking decreased by 90 per cent in areas where physical barriers have expanded?
subtitle: This allegation, made on the National Resistance Commission's "Facts of Borders" page, is problematic and largely meaningless in terms of proving the effectiveness of the border wall.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In four customs and border protection sectors where physical barriers have expanded, illegal trade has declined by at least 90 per cent.
